Package org.opends.server.replication.server

Class DataServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.replication.server.ServerHandler
        • org.opends.server.replication.server.DataServerHandler
  • public class DataServerHandler
extends ServerHandler
    This class defines a server handler, which handles all interaction with a peer server (RS or DS).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int maxQueueSize
      Specifies the max queue size for this handler.
      protected ReplicationServer replicationServer
      Local hosting RS.
      protected ReplicationServerDomain replicationServerDomain
      Specifies the related replication server domain based on baseDN.

                         int queueSize,
                         ReplicationServer replicationServer,
                         int rcvWindowSize)
        Creates a new data server handler.
        Parameters:
        session - The session opened with the remote data server.
        queueSize - The queue size.
        replicationServer - The hosting RS.
        rcvWindowSize - The receiving window size.

                               throws IOException

        Parameters:
        newGenId - The new generation id to take into account
        Throws:
        IOException - If IO error occurred.

      • setConsumerActive

        public void setConsumerActive​(boolean active)
        Set that the consumer is now becoming inactive and thus getNextMessage should not return any UpdateMsg any more.
        Parameters:
        active - the provided state of the consumer.

      • setInitialServerState

        public void setInitialServerState​(ServerState serverState)
                           throws DirectoryException
        Set the initial value of the serverState for this handler. Expected to be done once, then the state will be updated using updateServerState() method.
        Parameters:
        serverState - the provided serverState.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - raised when a problem occurs.

      • setBaseDNAndDomain

        protected void setBaseDNAndDomain​(DN baseDN,
                                  boolean isDataServer)
                           throws DirectoryException
        Set the baseDN for this handler. Expected to be done once and never changed during the handler life.
        Parameters:
        baseDN - The provided baseDN.
        isDataServer - The handler is a dataServer
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - raised when a problem occurs.
